attributes.action: Make it illegal to be able to withold your Telephone number when making a telephone call.
attributes.additional_details:
Make it illegal to withold your Telephone number when making a telephone call.
The practice of Witheld phone numbers is now nothing more than a cloak and a shield for criminal activity, scammers, and hoaxsers.
Receiving phone calls with the number witheld is now one of largest reasons for fear ,stress and anxiety in the home .
and is a real issue for many people.
